bike.description: 6066 hydroformed butted aluminum mainframe, OCLV co-molded carbon chainstays & seatstays, G2 29" Geometry

components.description: Custom Fox F100RP24, 100mm travel, custom G2 Geometry 46mm offset crown, air spring, 4-position external platform adjustment, external rebound adjustment
Bontrager Race X Lite Scandium 26" Tubeless Centerlock
Bontrager XDX, 26x2.1 (55/53), tubeless ready, 120 TPI, aramid folding bead
Bontrager Race X Lite Ti, hollow titanium rails, superlight foam
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon ACC, Carbon & Aluminum Shaft, 20mm Offset infinite adjust Bontrager head
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon, 620mm width, 5d backsweep, 31.8mm
Bontrager Race X Lite OS, 7d rise, 31.8mm
Cane Creek ZS6, semi-integrated, cartridge bearings, short cover
Avid Juicy Ultimate, hydraulic disc, carbon levers, aluminum pads, G2 Clean Sweep 160mm 6-bolt rotors
